thread.section_title: Citadines Trafalgar Square London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An excellent choice
thread.title_full: An excellent choice - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bapettit79
title: An excellent choice
text: What more can be said about this place that hasn't already been stated. The location is fantastic and is perfectly situated. Can walk to so many attractions. Having kitchen amenities available meant we could eat breakfast, prepare a lunch to eat while out and about, and cook dinner in the evening. Traveled with 2 children (10 and 7), the pullout sofa was perfect for them. Nice private room for us to sleep in and a nice big comfy bed. Nice staff, clean facility, great location and a nice room with plenty of space. We will be staying there again!!
